title: BRIEF-McCormick & Company Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.00
text: March 27, 2018 / 10:53 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-McCormick & Company Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $1.00 Reuters Staff March 27 (Reuters) - McCormick & Company Inc: * MCCORMICK REPORTS STRONG FIRST QUARTER RESULTS AND UPDATES 2018 FINANCIAL OUTLOOK * Q1 SALES ROSE 19 PERCENT * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.90 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 SALES UP 13 TO 15 PERCENT * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $4.86, REVENUE VIEW $5.46 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * COMPANY HAS PLANS TO ACHIEVE AT LEAST $100 MILLION OF COST SAVINGS IN 2018 * IMPACT OF FAVORABLE CURRENCY EXPECTED TO BE GREATER IN H1 OF 2018 THAN IN H2 * MCCORMICK & CO - NET FAVORABLE NON-RECURRING IMPACT OF RECENT U.S. TAX ACT, AMONG OTHER THINGS, INCREASED EPS BY $2.18 IN 2018 * QTRLY NET SALES $1,237.1 MILLION VERSUS $1,043.7 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $1.24 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
